class_notes: Title of class:  Biology for the People.  This class is for SENIORS and has a LECTURE (MW, 4-5:15) and a DISCUSSION SECTION (F, 4-4:50).  Permission of instructor is required.  Contact Barbara Shannon at barbara.shannon@emory.edu for permission.  This course will prepare you to critically evaluate what you read in the professional and online Medical, Biomedical, Biological, and Ecological literature and will cover a variety of topics.  Prerequisites:  Biology 142 + 142L.   This class may be taken as elective credit for the Biology major.
course_description: A course on topics of special biological interest, designed for Biology majors elective credit. This course is repeatable when the topic varies.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
